Quiz Quest

An engaging quiz competition covering movies, songs, technology, and emojis!

About the Event

Join us for an exciting quiz competition covering movies, songs, technology, and emojis. Teams will challenge their knowledge and work together to answer questions.

Event Details

Round 1: Pen and Paper Round

Participants will receive a series of written questions across various categories. Teams will have a set time to answer as many questions as possible.

Round 2: Buzzer Round

Teams will compete in a fast-paced buzzer round, where questions are posed, and the first team to buzz in gets the chance to answer.

Rules & Regulations

  • Each team must consist of 3 participants.
  • Two teams per college.
  • In the pen and paper round, answers must be submitted clearly on the provided sheets.
  • In the buzzer round, answers must be verbal.
  • All participants must maintain respect and sportsmanship throughout the event.

Judging Criteria

  • Knowledge Accuracy: Depth of knowledge across categories.
  • Speed of Response: Quick and correct answers in the buzzer round.
